long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Touremind shows you all currently running and upcoming eSports events of games of your choosing. 

Currently, touremind supports the following games:

Dota 2
Starcraft: Broodwar
Starcraft 2

It gets its data directly from the teamliquid servers, hence its always up to date. 

CHANGELOG

1.1.1:
    - fixed a bug where list of standard events would not update
1.1.0:
    - font style changed to tahoma
    - font size changes according to resolution
    - notification when events come online or are already           running on start
    - list of standard events users will be notified about list will be down
      loaded from touremind.net
    - added options menu
    - added horizontal lines to the eventlist
    - added dota2 and broodwar support. info comes from teamliquid
